= Setting up web authentication for Click Template =

== Tomcat ==

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<tomcat-users>
  <role rolename="user"/>
  <role rolename="admin"/>
  <user username="user" password="password" roles="user"/>
  <user username="admin" password="password" roles="user,admin"/>
</tomcat-users>
